name: Rick & Morty Randomizer
description: A web app that displays a unique random character from the show Rick and Morty for you everyday. Dont Like your chatacter of the day? You have the option to choose another!

name: Space Jams
description: Inspired by outerspace, I built a web app that contains space related information from different sources.

name: Space Jams micro-service
description: A micro service that consumes data from various APIs, consolidates and optimizes the data to feed to one of my personal projects.

name: Portfolio API
description: A minimal API that has the data of the projects I'm most proud of and have worked on throughout my coding journey.

name: Buendia UI
description: A UI component library I've created to use in some of my personal projects.

name: Buendia Bytes
description: My personal porfolio displaying all my planned and completed projects, things I've learned along the way and some of my favorite tools of the trade. This is it! you're in it!
